question: Who can attend the orientation?
answer: Woodsworth Orientation is open to all incoming  students at the University of Toronto.

question: Why should I attend the orientation?
answer: Attending Orientation Week at Woodsworth College is an absolute must if you are an incoming Woodsworth student! is all about rolling out the red carpet for you. Our dedicated Orientation Team has put in countless hours to create an action-packed week for you! Get ready for fun events like Block Party, where we've got inflatables, carnival games, rock climbing, tricycle races, etc; Tri-Campus Parade, get a taste of the vibrant community that awaits you; skating, and much more! Furthermore, Orientation Week at Woodsworth College is where friendships are forged and memories are made. You'll meet an awesome bunch of fellow students who are just as eager to make new connections as you are.

question: How can I prepare for the orientation?
answer: All we ask is that you make sure you purchase your orientation ticket, and bring a fun attitude with you!

question: What will we be doing during the orientation?
Will food be provided?
answer: YES! Food will be provided throughout orientation week as a part of your orientation package. Please let us know of any dietary restrictions we should be aware of in the ticketing form. You can email orientation@mywcsa if you forgot to mention anything in the ticketing form.

question: What else do we get from orientation?
answer: Other than some amazing, long-lasting friendships, and lots of fun - Orientation provides you with so much more. Orientation offers the knowledge of where your classes are and opportunities to join clubs and meet their execs. You’ll also get a free t-shirt and a kit which includes (merch list)

question: How do I get to the orientation events?
answer: You only need to worry about getting yourself to Woodsworth College every day! Most events will be taking place on campus and we provide transportation from Woodsworth to all off-campus events.

question: Why are there so many wolves on this website?
Do I need to come to all events?
answer: Participation in all Orientation events is completely optional. We encourage everyone to participate in any and all events they are comfortable with - or get out of your comfort zone and try something new. However, if you don’t want to participate in an activity, that’s no big deal!

question: What if I have accessibility accommodations?
answer: If you have any accommodations please indicate them when you register. Woodsworth maintains its extensive efforts to accommodate all students with accessibility needs. We ask that you please notify us at orientation@mywcsa.com of these accommodations at least 2 weeks prior to orientation to give us sufficient time to properly accommodate you
